title: CML Single Pole Decorator Light Switch, 20 Pack Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Interrupter, UL Listed, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #16,928 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)  #65 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: 10,000+ cycle test approved rocker switch. Single pole. 15A 120-277V
Sturdy impact-resistant polycarbonate construction for residential and commercial use
Modern sleek design and smooth paddle rocker, CML decorator style switch can be used in houses, apartments and offices, schools, stores, restaurants, public facilities, and hotels
Easy installation. Terminal screws accept copper or copper-clad wire (up to 12 AWG). Quick push-in terminals accept 14 AWG solid copper wire only. Break-off plaster ear ensures flush alignment
UL & CUL listed. CML provides 3-year replacement

customers_say: Customers find the light switches work well and are easy to install, offering good value for money. However, the quality receives mixed feedback, with some customers reporting that 20% of them break. Moreover, the color match is also mixed, with customers noting they look like off-white but don't match white switch plates. Additionally, several customers mention the switches are not silent.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_snippet: This was definitely best product, price and the easiest to install!

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Nice wall switches with glowing LED night light illuminates in the dark, making it easy to find the wall switch at night. UL listed

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLess than half Dep and Lows price with same day delivery
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: And I didn't have to drive to the store. Cool

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: After 6 months of installation 20% of them break, the clip that holds the switch to the unit falls apart. Giving 3 stars because I did a whole house and the price was right.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Great product for a great price.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are a great buy. We'll save you a bunch of money compared to going to Lowe's or home Depot. One bit of critique: The spacing for the ground hookup is a little shy of what you need to hook up a wire normally. You have to slide it in on the bottom or top of the ground screw bend the wire around then slide it back through. A little bit more clearance should be allotted so you can just slip the wire over.
